data.title: Mid Wooden Doors to Bottom Mid Toxic Screen
data.description: This is a good toxic screen to create a full wall blocking Bottom Mid.

data.title: B Site to Top Mid Toxic Screen
data.description: This is a good toxic screen to block both the entrance to B Site and Top Mid.

data.title: Mid Wooden Doors Poison Cloud
data.description: This is a good poison cloud to create a one-way smoke at Mid Wooden Doors.
